title: Retrieve Pensions Reliefs
description: Allows the amendments of pensions reliefs

submittedOn.description: An ISO-8601 compliant date-time representing when pensions reliefs was submitted on.

pensionReliefs.description: Object that holds the key value for tax relief you get on your pension contributions.

regularPensionContributions.description:
The amount of regular pension contributions.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

oneOffPensionContributionsPaid.description:
The total amount of the one off pensions contribution.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

retirementAnnuityPayments.description:
The total amount of retirement annuity received.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

paymentToEmployersSchemeNoTaxRelief.description:
The amount of payments to employers scheme.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

overseasPensionSchemeContributions.description:
The amount of overseas pension scheme contributions.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource

href.description: The relative url of the endpoint

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The rel will be self where the action is retrieval of the same resource
